channel.title: Rocky on 牧人池塘
channel.description: Recent content in Rocky on 牧人池塘

item.title: Rocky9替换国内镜像源
item.description: 替换为腾讯云镜像: sed -e 's|^mirrorlist=|#mirrorlist=|g' \ -e 's|^#baseurl=http://dl.rockylinux.org/$contentdir|baseurl=https://mirrors.cloud.tencent.com/rocky|g' \ -i.bak \ /etc/yum.repos.d/rocky-extras.repo \ /etc/yum.repos.d/rocky.repo 替换后运行 dnf makecache 更新缓存 Rocky9国内镜像源地址： 阿里云AlmaLinux镜像：https://mirrors.aliyun.com/rockylinux/ 腾
